A dove with its wings spread wide, holding an olive branch in its beak. The olive branch symbolizes peace and unity, while the wings represent freedom and openness.
A circle with a blue center, surrounded by white and green bands. The blue center represents the sky, while the white and green bands symbolize the earth and nature, respectively.
A tree with its branches reaching towards the sky, surrounded by a ring of flowers. The tree represents growth and prosperity, while the flowers symbolize harmony and balance.
A pair of hands forming a heart shape, with the index fingers pointing towards each other. The heart shape represents love and compassion, while the fingers symbolize connection and understanding.
A stylized sun with its rays extending outwards, surrounded by a halo. The sun represents light and warmth, while the halo symbolizes hope and positivity.
